subject: First visit to Japan

Dear all - 

It looks like I might get two weeks in Japan this year!

Ideally I would like to visit the Okazaki area and get a feel for the
old Matsudaira stomping grounds. What can I hope to achieve in 
that time? When's the best time to go? What should I not miss, 
and what should I not bother with?

Does anything still exist, besides castles and museums?

Probably a thousand other questions, but any advice/thoughts/
comments would be useful.

Tom
